overview: Young Gregory Tudor sees his local ice cream man murdered and later grows up to inherit his business, opting to inject gruesome ingredients—including human body parts—into his frozen confections. When one of the neighborhood boys goes missing, the local kids suspect Gregory and band together to get to the bottom of things.
tagline: I scream, you scream, we all scream for the...
cast: Clint Howard|Olivia Hussey|David Warner|Jan-Michael Vincent|Sandahl Bergman
